tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: Worst professor I have ever had. He never answers questions thoroughly and isn\'t pleasant to be around. You have an opportunity to do 5 tests (one is dropped) and 3 out of 5 papers (one is dropped). The tests are worded to fool you and he grades the papers extremely hard. Read the books thoroughly and be specific when writing papers.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  GET READY TO READ  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: You MUST do you reading if you want to get anything out of this class and do well. The tests are based a little off the lectures, but mostly the reading. He isn\'t easy, but it\'s mostly because with the tests, either you are correct or you aren\'t. There is no middle ground with the tests. There are like 5 papers, but only 3 count, if I remember.

comments: This professor is not as bad as these reviews. He has an interesting sense of humor, chooses good books to read, and tests are graded on a curve. You only need to write 2 out of 4 assigned papers, and he drops your lowest test score.

comments: Although attendance is not mandatory it is best not to miss a day. Professor is a character and strict on tardiness. Not helpful to his students. Test are tough with material that has not been discussed. AVOID if possible

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Horrible class but for a lot of Majors it sadly is the one you must take. He is the only teacher for MGMT 117. Very disorganized and has extremely odd policies on nearly everything in his class. Grades tests on a curve because he asks obscure, non-core questions on the material. Again, it\'s sad you NEED this class in most instances. Shame on CSUS

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: INSPIRATIONAL  GET READY TO READ  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Straight forward about his gradingclassroom policies right off the bat. He selects some really great reading material, shares short you-tube clips & articles that make the class entertaining. No doubt, lots of reading & exams to make sure your keeping up wit as well as 4 1000 word papers but he\'s a really brilliant guy & super interesting class

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: You learn a lot in this class. It is not an easy class and yes Marens is a character. If you are a student who actually goes to class, does the required reading, and you know how to properly organize an essay, then you will be totally fine! He will try to scare you out of class initially so that it only leaves serious students.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This professor is unreal. It\'s absolutely a self taught class. He goes on political rants, which are funny because his head is obviously up in the clouds, but makes it harder on students. Attendance is MANDATORY. His expectations for essays are absurd! I received my FIRST ever F in college on an essay I wrote for his class. AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: By far, the worst professor I have ever had. He is extremely rude to students and extremely unhelpful. He does not appear to care about the student in any way. He should not be teaching. His lectures do not make any sense. His grading does not make any sense. Unfortunately, he was the only proffessor teaching this course. AVOID!!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He is an interesting character. Do not walk in late or leave early. The tests are manageable because he does add points to exam grades. Make sure you attend class and do the readings. This class is doable and he does have a good sense of humor.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Second to worst teacher Ive ever had. 4 essays 1 rewrite. 5 quizes. in the last 4 classes he has three esays due (one being the rewrite). He is hard to follow in his lectures and sounds like a parrot. He is extremely unaproachable and rude. After the first test I found that most of the material is from his handouts. Grades hard on essays.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Too much unimportant reading and no clear outline of what will be on the test. He tests you on useless knowledge. Nice, interesting, smart and funny but a HORRIBLE teacher. He would be a great teacher if he followed some sort of an outline and had the outline available to the class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This is one professor that is not very good at lecturing. His exams were not clearly written and he refuses to use powerpoint or pass out an outline of the material to be discussed. You should focus on the subjects he brings up in class and take notes to pass his 3 exams. Yes, the material is dry but try to attend class anyway.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: It was a mistake to take this class!Marens has got to be the worse prof here at Sac State. He wants you to participate but ridicules you for doing so. His readings especially Partnoy is aweful. His lectures are terribly hard to follow. His quiz and exams are due either same day or same week as paper. Total of 4 essays, 5 exams, 2 quizes!! BEWARE!!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This guy is among the WORST professors I have ever had. If you don\'t know the answer he wants, first expect a cynical reponse from him, followed by class silence. His questions to the class are very indirect, leaving most students 90% of the time thinking "What IS the question?!?!" He will ridicule you for not knowing. "I will not spoon feed you"

tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Tough Grader (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He is disrespectful to any student that comes to his class late.His lectures are extremely hard to follow as he keeps bouncing from topic to topic. The final writing assignment is hard as he only gives it to students a week before finals begin. In short take this class from anyone but him.
